titlestmt.titleproper: Stanford University, Honors Program in Latin American Studies, Theses
Stanford University, Honors Program in Latin American Studies, Theses SC4-4257

publicationstmt.publisher: Department of Special Collections and University Archives

note.p: This encoded finding aid is compliant with Stanford EAD Best Practice Guidelines, Version 1.0.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2018-01-22 13:21:20 -0800.

repository.corpname: Department of Special Collections and University Archives

did.unittitle: Stanford University, Honors Program in Latin American Studies, theses

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: Stanford University. Center for Latin American Studies

did.abstract: The collection consists of Latin American Studies honors theses written by Stanford University undergraduates.

accessrestrict.head: Information about Access
accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research; materials must be requested at least 48 hours in advance of intended use. No photocopies may be made.

userestrict.head: Ownership & Copyright
userestrict.p: Copyright is retained by the creators for materials they have authored or otherwise produced. Transmission or reproduction of materials requires the written permission of the copyright owner.

prefercite.head: Cite As
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Stanford University, Latin American Studies, Honors Theses (SC4-4257). Dept. of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of Latin American Studies honors theses written by Stanford University undergraduates.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was transferred to the Stanford University Archives by the center for Latin American Studies in August 2010. Additional theses were transferred from the Hume Writing Center in 2011.

controlaccess.corpname: Stanford University. Center for Latin American Studies
